sentences.sContent: The cost of transport is a major expense for an industry. Hence factory location is an important consideration.
sentences.sCn: 运输成本是企业的一大支出，因此工厂选址是重要的考虑因素。

sentences.sContent: The gases that may be warming the planet will have their main effect many years hence.
sentences.sCn: 这些可能正在使行星变暖的气体，其重要影响将在许多年之后显现。

words.tran: 今后；从今以后；自此以后
